plot: Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge, bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns about the difference between other people's plans and fantasies.

Hector Poole is a meek and mild bank clerk who with the toss of a coin can suddenly hear people's thoughts. He's slow to catch on to exactly what he's hearing but soon learns that his manager, Mr. Bagby, is having an affair and that a fellow employee, Miss Turner, is attracted to him. When he "hears" long-time employee Mr. Smithers plan to fill his briefcase with the bank's money and run off, Poole tells his boss. It doesn't quite go as planned but in the end it all works out well for Poole.—garykmcd
